/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Among these structures, a large roundabout stands out, adorned with a colorful mural that adds a touch of artistic flair to the otherwise mundane cityscape. The street itself is lined with trees, their green foliage contrasting with the concrete jungle. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the details and colors of the scene.
